items.sentence: What's the point of being on a team if everyone just does their own thing?
These straw mats, called "tatami" in Japanese, are no longer made by hand.
Tom's mind went blank when he got up to give the eulogy at Mary's funeral.
Tom's success was due more to his persistent hard work than to his talent.
As a matter of fact, he did just catch that bird in midair with his teeth.
